summary: This is an email chain from November 8, 2021, regarding logistical support for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. It discusses the use of the 40 Foley Bridge for the trial team and requests the names of FBI Special Agents assigned to escort witnesses to and from court.

events.title: Email Coordination for Maxwell Trial Support
events.description: Email correspondence between the FBI and the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding logistical support for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial, including witness escort and parking coordination.

keyFacts: The email is dated November 8, 2021, and pertains to the Ghislaine Maxwell trial.
The Court authorized the use of the 40 Foley Bridge for the trial team, AUSA supervisors, case agents, and witnesses (but not their attorneys).
The U.S. Attorney's Office requested the names of FBI Special Agents assigned to escort witnesses to and from court.
The email also discusses coordinating parking and building access if the FBI needs to drive witnesses.
All specific names of individuals (senders, recipients) are redacted in the provided text.
